m64tweak.name: Change Hanging from Ceiling Speeds
m64tweak.description: Original ASM code by jesusyoshi Tweak version by Blakeoramo
m64tweak.patch: 19D08: 3C 01 42 00 19D1C: 3C 01 40 80 19F8C: 29 41 00 08 19D0A: [16, "max hang spd", hex] 19D1E: [16, "spd gained per frame", hex] 19F8F: [8, "time before you can start moving", hex]
